text: Matsukawaya Co., Ltd. is a Japanese confectionery company that makes . ==History== On February 26, 2018, in Washington DC, wagashi master chefs and members of the Matsukawaya Company made a hands-on presentation about the making a wagashi. On February 26, 2018, in Washington DC, wagashi master chefs and members of the Matsukawaya Company made a hands-on presentation about the making a wagashi. It was founded in 1862 in Nagoya, Japan. Currently, Yoshitaka Nishino is the CEO. ==References== Category:Manufacturing companies based in Nagoya Category:Japanese brands Category:Wagashi Category:Japanese companies established in 1862
